entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Island Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:42 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
